title: Memorials of his time,
author: Cockburn, Henry Cockburn
snippet: His best professional achievement was his written argument for Lord Daer, in support of the right of the eldest sons of Scotch peers to sit in the House of Commons ; and his best political one was, the bill for the reform of the Scotch representation in 1785, which he drew, and his share in the measures connected with that project.

author: Bede, Cuthbert
